sentence: AbuSafia  says  the  first  airstrike  hit  his  home  on  October  13th,  killing  his  father  and  badly  injuring  his  two  brothers.
A  second  airstrike  on  October  29th  killed  the  rest  of  his  family.
The  day  of  the  first  airstrike,  AbuSafia  recieved  an  unusually  long  text  from  his  father  before  he  was  killed.
And  after  that,  I  received  the  news  that  night  that  my  father  was  killed,"  AbuSafia  said.
Then  AbuSafia  said  the  second  airstrike  hit  his  aunt's  house,  killing  everybody  else  in  his  family  except  his  aunt.
"A  colleague  at  the  AlShifa  Hospital,  she  texted  me  saying,  'I  don't  know  how  to  put  this  in  words,  but  your  brother  Osama  was  killed.  '
To  hear  that  all  of  them  were  found,  killed,"  he  said.
All  together,  at  least  39  members  of  AbuSafia's  family  have  been  killed,  including  his  mother,  father,  and  five  brothers.
